column4: I've been tryin' to get WoW to run on WINE It runs well enough to patch up to the current version and now it's hanging with these errors as soon as I submit my login info err:d3d:InitAdapters Failed to initialize gl caps for default adapter
err:wine_d3d:WineDirect3DCreate Direct3D9 is not available without opengl (I've already followed what I saw on the forums about getting it up and running)
